definition[0]: the ability to give a sensible amount of time and effort to your work and to your life outside work, for example to your family or to other interests
example[0]: You can’t have a proper work-life balance if you’re in the office for 12 hours a day.
definition[1]: a situation in which you are able to give the right amount of time and effort to your work and to your personal life outside work, for example to your family or to other interests
example[1]: You can’t have a proper work-life balance if you’re in the office for 12 hours a day!
